{{Wireless embedded system |brand=3Com |model=3CRWE60092A |revision=(WL306) |asin=B00006BA2W |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=EoL |fcc_date=03/05/2001 |fcc_id=DF6-SRWL306 |type=access point |pcb_id= |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=ns, af |cpu1_brand=No Wires Needed |cpu1_model=Poldhu |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=2 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, console,, DE-9,, (19200 8N1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=No Wires Needed |wi1_chip1_model=Poldhu |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861 |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=unknown |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM5201 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass=comcomcom |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|3Com 11Mbps Wireless LAN Access Point 6000}} :;aka WL-306 The Ethernet PHY would appear to be from ''[[Broadcom]]''. :It may be BCM5201. Default settings are per the FCC manual (the password :seems to be for console / telnet access). ===Possible used PSU(s)=== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is from '''AULT'''.. :but the model seems to be bogus (SC102TA48XXNXX). ===PoE=== *Power over Ethernet (PoE): 802.3af (2003), 802.3at (2009), 802.3bt (2017) :Universal Power over Ethernet (UPoE) • 60W [[Cisco]] (2011) :Linear Technology (LTPoE+) • 90W [[Linear Technology]]/[[Analog Devices]] (2010) :Power Source Equipment (PSE), Powered Device (PD) :Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP), Maintain Power Signature (MPS) :;PoE, PoE+, LTPoE+, UPoE (PoE++), 4PPoE, 
Standard	802.3af		802.3at		802.3bt		802.3bt
Type number	Type 1		Type 2		Type 3		Type 4
Power over Eth	PoE		PoE+		UPoE (++)	4PPoE
Power (PSE)	15.40W		30.0W		60W		100W
Voltage (PSE)	44-57V		50-57V		50-57V		52-57V
Power (PD)	12.95W		25.5W		51W		71.3W
Voltage (PD)	37-57V		42-57V		42-57V		41-57V
Current (Imax)	350mA		600mA		600mA 2x	960mA 4x
Category (Cat)	Cat 3		Cat 5		Cat 5e		Cat 5e
